title: Slate's Spoiler Specials: Casino Royale
description:
NPR reporter and gambling aficionado Mike Pesca gives his assessment of what the new James Bond movie Casino Royale and other movies get right and wrong about poker. WARNING: This podcast is meant to be heard AFTER you've seen the movie.
        

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
